text: Makanan enak. Harga lumayan. Parkirannya agak sempit tapi katanya sudah ditambah lahan parkir, okelah. Ruangannya selalu rame, cukup enak buat ketemu klien

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Tricia Halim
text:
Tempat Bu Rudy di ruko2 ini luas banget, cocok buat yang kepingin makan indonesian food santai banyak macam pilihan menu tanpa buat kantong jebol dan pastinya rasanya enak. Pelayanan cuepet pol, makanan keluar ga sampai 5 menit sejak pesan.

Lantai 1 khusus parkiran
Lantai 2 pusat oleh2
Lantai 3 tempat makan

Sukses terus ya Bu Rudy! Ikut senang dengar cerita dari orang nda punya sampai sekarang sukses dan bisa mengikuti jaman ❤️

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Renatta Angelina
text: Pagi jam 7, Depot Bu Rudy sudah buka. Walau semua pegawai akan sibuk mengurus dan melakukan persiapan bahkan pemilik juga turut tangan berkutat di dapur (bukan di kasir loh) soalnya hampir sebagian besar makanan yang dijual di depot ini adalah masakan Bu Rudy sendiri. Enak enak, variasi nya lengkap dan banyak. Kalau pagi kesini semua masakan baru matang dan bisa tercium sangat wangi dan uap yg mengepul bener2 tajam. Bon nya masih yg tradisional (ketik ketik), segala yang dibeli di Bu Rudy pasti dimasukkan ke dalam kresek merah.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Andi Kurniawan
text: Sambal, petis, bumbu, krupuk, dll menjadi pilihan buat oleh oleh. Gedung baru yg luas dan suasana bersih nyaman. Parkir dibawah gedung, jika penuh parkir dipinggir jalan dipandu tukang parkir.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Fajar Setya Adhi
text: Makanannya seperti masakan rumahan. Tempat kalau dapat yg tepat, nyaman. Rame tempatnya.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Praptono Pacar Kembang
text: Not bad. Banyak Cici chindo yang pakaian nya sexy. Makanan B aja sih. Tapi tempat oke.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: מחילה
text: Tempat makan yang udah lama terkenal dengan nasi udangnya, dan sekarang dilengkapi juga dengan pusat oleh-oleh. Banyak varian jajanan basah dan kering, lauk yang sudah disiapkan di kotak2 tinggal tunjuk, bayar, dan take out, juga yang demen per'sambelan ada aneka sambal yang di packing di botol plastik

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Wzrhur
text: Ini namanya warteg yg mengusung konsep modern dan aesthetic 😁 masakan rumahan, rasanya medhok, enakkk pokoknya. Tempatnya ramai, tp bersih polll. Banyak petugas nya, pelayanannya juga baik

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Eden O. V.
text:
Jarang pergi ke Surabaya dan bingung tempat makan yg enak dengan harga hemat? Di sini tempatnya. Pilihan menu makanan minumannya banyak macam, harga terjangkau, rasa sesuai dengan ekspektasi.
Tempat nyaman bersih, pelayanan cepat dan tersedia tempat parkir mobil yg luas juga. Ngga perlu bingung pilih, karena semua yg ada rasanya enak.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: thomy utomo
text: kalo ada temen luar kota pasti andalan ke bu rudy ini, rasanya cocok menunya beragam, mau beli oleh2 juga bisa langsung

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Prita Hariyono
text: Ok buat travelers dan lanjut usia, lantai 1 untuk tempat beli oleh2, lantai 2 untuk resto dan ada liftnya, makanannya juga enak2 dan semakin tambah menu yang disajikan, bisnis yang ok

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: koleksikikie
text: Tempat cari oleh-oleh makanan paling lengkap di Surabaya. Tidak hanya menyediakan beragam pilihan makanan produksi merk Bu Rudi tapi juga produk2 UKM dari Jawa Timur.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Abdul Majid
text:
Ketika anda masuk ke lantai 2 untuk makan anda akan langsung tahu bahwa ini memang resto legend di Surabaya, kebanyakan pengunjungnya adalah pelanggan dengan usia matang dengan membawa keluarganya. Rasa masakan makanannya enak, dengan harga yang lumayan tinggi untuk menu yang banyak ditemukan di tempat lain.
Tapi percayalah, makanannya memang enak. Layak dicoba dan akhirnya anda akan menjadi pelanggan setianya

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Marlina Kusumadewi
text: Tempat jajan oleh2 kalau ke surabaya nich yg terkenal dari dulu sambel bawangnya juara sama udang keringnya..ada berbagai macam oleh2 disediakan disini..mau makan juga ada depotnya..tempatnya bersih juara dech..

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Venus
text: Salah satu kuliner legendaris di surabaya. Resto selalu ramai pengunjung apalagi di jam makan siang. Terdapat berbagai macam menu dg rasa yg tdk perlu diragukan lagi. Selain ragam menu yg jadi khasnya adalah sambel bu rudy. Mantab pedasnya.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: floppy disc (M. Adam Hesa)
text:
Tempat ini mudah ditemukan, yang paling populer adalah sambelnya, ada 3 varian sambel yaitu sambal bajak, sambal bawang, dan sambal ijo.
Sambal memang penambah selera makan paling mantab, hati-hati sambal ini bisa bikin ketagihan, sambel ini levelnya cukup pedas, bagi yg tidak suka pedas harus siapkan minuman hangat untuk meredakan pedasnya. Klo beli banyak bisa dapat kardus gratis untuk packing.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: lovi dewi
text:
best asem asem iga dan lodeh tewel uenak puol.

Sambal bu rudy mantap. Pisang goreng madu nya enak puollll

Menu baru nasi madura kurang nendang... perlu di koreksi resepnya

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: cindy satriyo
text:
Ya tempat makan, ya pusat oleh-oleh. Tempat wajib kalau berkunjung ke surabaya..
Restonya masakan khas surabaya..
Sambel bu rudynya mantab puol...
Pisang goreng madunya juaraa....
Tahu pong dan petisnxa juga enak...
Bala-bala alis ote2 mini juga kriuk...
Rujak cingurnya... gak ada tandinganya...
Reservasi untuk 30 orang bisa banget..
Pelayannya ramah.. gerceppp..yg di ruang VIP..

Namun tempat parkir mobil sangat terbatas..

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Desi L
text: Salah 1 resto Legend d sby. Ownernya pasti udh tau. Disni menu sangat banyak sampe bingung mau menu apa. Hrg jg sesuai dg rasa. Tempat yg luas adem dn pasti instagramable. Di lt 1 khusus tenpat oleh² dn lt 2 itu resto. Pokoknya rekomen buat yg pengen arisan atau sekedar makan. Pelayanan jg cepat. Sayangnya gak sempet ketemu B Rudy. 😄

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Way Nonong
text: Beli sop buntut, kuahnya cenderung asin, oleh² nya lengkap dan variatif...cocok buat beli oleh² khas jawa timur & surabaya

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Nina Chandrasari
text: Pusat Oleh2 nya surabaya. Yang khas ya sambel bu rudy nya. tapi makananlain juga sama enaknya. harga sedikit mahal tapi masih ok lah. pelayanan cepat, tempat juga lumayan nyaman

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Felita Gutana
text:
Makanannya oke ssuai harga tp ga sebegitu enaknya sih enak biasa aja. Empal udang & madura lbh worth madura tp isiannya empal sm paru (babat saya ganti paru) dan dpt peyek udang worth bgt sih pdhl beda 2k aja. Peyeknya beda rsanya ga kyk peyek" murah biasa masuk kategori enak dan rasanya ckup beda dg setara yg enak.
Kata"nya yg udh pernah makan, beda empal & sambelnya enak dlu lbh nampol, dan empalnya dlu kering nggak lembek kyk sekarang.
Gorengannya ote" trnyata bukan 6k yg spt di menu, isi ayam seaweed sm pisang madu total 19+ tapi jujur aja ote" nggak enak bgt, rasa tepung isian dkit bgt, pisang madu jg kurang tp hrg masih oklah.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Fitri R
text:
Akh klo kesini selalu kalap makan, jajan, dan belanja. Nasi udangnya enak. Salah satu tempat yang pas juga buat beli oleh-oleh.
Well, depot bu rudi ini salah satu destinasi yang wajib kunjung buat yang ke surabaya. Selain menu makanannya si nasi udang yang famous banget sampai store yang juga jadi salah satu pusat oleh-oleh. Bukan cuma buat orang-orang dari luar surabaya, bahkan saya sendiri yang asli surabaya juga demen banget mampir sini. Lokasinya yang ada di pinggir jalan membuat tempat ini mudah di cari. Pelayanannya juga baik, harga food and beveragenya standart, worth dg rasanya. Enak dan khas. Untuk harga berbagai macam produk oleh-oleh juga masih terjangkau. Didepan toko ini terdapat beberapa booth yang bisa juga dijadikan buah tangan. Hanya saja untuk tempat parkir mungkin akan sedikit sulit jika pengunjung sedang banyak-banyaknya.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Pantaria N. F.
text: Menu favoritku nasi udang empal dan nasi bakar tuna. Nasi udang nya sambalnya mantap.. udangnya banyak.. empalnya juga enak. Harga standar. Porsi banyak dan mengenyangkan.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Jenahara
text: Suka banget sama tempatnya lantai atas untuk restoran dan lantai bawah untuk oleh oleh. Pelayanan cepat dan ramah. Varian makanannya banyak. Untuk akses lantai atas bisa menggunakan tangga ataupun lift

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Eva Ayudhanarta
text:
Menu baru di Bu Rudy hari ini ada Dorang goreng sambel penyet. Enak banget! Dorangnya renyah, asin & gurih. Renyahnya sampai kresss-kresss, nasi pasti tidak selamat, cepat habis. Sambalnya sepertinya sambal terasi tomat ada pilihan sedang, pedas, atau tidak pedas, diberi jeruk pecel jadi rasa sambelnya segar mantab. Lalapannya ada di balik ikan dorang, tenang, cukup kok porsinya buat 1 orang, mengenyangkan.

Pelayanannya cukup baik, kini makin cepat, cukup cekatan. Sesekali ada pramusaji yang mengecek bahwa pesanan sudah sesuai atau belum.

Ada menu-menu spesial yang tidak ada di menu bisa langsung ditanyakan ke pramusaji. Biasanya di awal mereka menawarkan "menu spesial/baru hari ini", silakan ditanyakan saja apabila punya pesanan dengan kriteria khusus(misalnya sambal dipisah, sayur dipisah, & sebagainya) supaya sesuai dengan selera makan masing2. Juga silakan cek bahka porsi minuman ada 2 macam, normal & jumbo. Beberapa pilihan minuman hanya tersedia porsi jumbo begitu pula sebaliknya.

Parkirannya sekarang lumayan teratur & ga begitu bikin macet, pelayanan parkir juga cukup cekatan.

Terimakasih.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Niazura Maria
text: Salah satu tempat beli oleh - oleh di Surabaya... Yang terkenal dengan sambalnya... But bukan hanya sambal yang ada disini tapi banyak makanan n minuman khas jawa n yang kekinian pun ada disini... Pelayanannya ramah2... Jadi bisa bertanya sepuasnya tentang produk makanan yang dijual disini... Parkirannya luas meskipun agak harus jalan jauh dari lokasi...

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Adham Rizkiawan
text: Yang sedang ke Surabaya harus makan disini. Makanannya enak dan terutama sambalnya itu yang mantap. Area makan ada di lantai 3. Bagi yang mau membeli oleh-oleh khas Bu Rudy bisa ke lantai 2, disana lengkap ada sambal Bu Rudy, petis, cemilan, dan sejenisnya. Cocok buat konsumsi sendiri dan bingkisan. Sangat memuaskan.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Jerry 15
text: Satu-satunya masakan, sambal dan jajanan dan makanan lezat lainnya yang terbuat dari produk segar yang eksklusif di Surabaya. Semuanya dikombinasikan dengan suasana depot yang selalu ramai pengunjung dan pelayan yang ramah

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: ivan tampubolon
text: Sy sangat dibantu saat kehilangan hp. Karyawannya cekatan melihat di cctv hingga akhirnya diketahui hp terselip di buku menu, dicarikan dan ditemukan. Puji TUHAN, trimakasih buat karyawan Depot Bu Rudy. Sukses dan bahagia selalu. Terimakasih.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Deden Ahmad R
text:
Legenda...
Menu makan udangnya kriuk banget,bisa tambah sambal legend sepuasanya disini,tentu saja jangan terlewat untuk beli oleh-oleh surabaya di depot ini

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Auliya Qa
text: Makan rame2 rombongan, dsambut ramah sama ownernya...pelayanannya juga oke...makanannya enak, banyakan lauknya drpd nasinya 😁

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Minami Kim
text: Kesini karna katanya enak tapi ternyata biasa aja rasanya. Bu rudy nya ramah tapi sayang banget pelayanan karyawannya gak banget. Jadi mampir kesini cuman karna bu rudy yang baik dan ramah banget

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Nurul Aisyiyah
text: Despite mark up price ya produk nya tapi emang lengkap banget cocok buat cari oleh oleh. Tempatnya bersih, display nya juga tertata rapi dan eye catching.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: simon wahyudi
text: Toko yang paling iconic di surabaya, kalau dateng ke surabaya tapi tdk membawa pulang sambel bu rudy serasa belum ke surabaya... selain sambal, toko ini juga jual berbagai oleh2 yang lain seperti dendeng, abon, udang kering dll

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Octavianus Stevie Lianto
text: Best outlets Bu Rudy terbaik di Surabaya dibandingkan dengan outlets yang lainnya. Pelayanan nya bagus, makanan lengkap dan cepat.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Ijal
text: Tempat makan dengan berbagai macam pilihan menu. Menu favoritnya Nasi Udang Empal, Nasi bakarnya enak, jangan lupa coba aneka gorengan nya terutama tahu pong. Ada pisang goreng madu, ketela goreng. Semua makanan nya mantab. Sambal bawang nya enak. Sambal bawang nya bisa buat oleh2, ada sambal ijo. Aneka oleh2 khas jawa timur, jajanan basah.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Ekayanti Ananda
text: Banyak pilihan menu makanan. Camilan favorit paksu pisang goreng madu nya.👍🏻

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Subakti Muttaqin
text:
Sambal Pecel Khas Oleh Oleh Surabaya... dan macam macam makanan yang siap dinikmati bisa ditemukan disini
Gak pernah sepi dari pemburu oleh oleh khas suroboyo.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Aulia Rahman
text: Makanan dan menu di bu rudy adalah standar. Standar hawcekk ueweenakkk. Semua makanan, enak! Pastikan juga beli sambalnya buat stok di rumah. Sudah gitu aja, nggak perlu panjang-panjang review depot resto satu ini. Semua masakan di bawah pengawasan bu rudy lgsg. Kalau anda makan, sering akan lihat beliau mondar mandir manage anak buah dan awasi masakan. Top deh. Ga ada obat capeknya.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Masyrifah Jazm
text:
Selain berfungsi sebagai depot, Bu Rudy juga menjual berbagai macam jenis sambal, aneka camilan tradisional hingga modern. Anda juga dapat memesan secara online melalui whatsapp official Bu Rudy atau pesan via Gojek.

Makanan lezat dan terjangkau. Ada ruangan vip yang ber-AC jika ingin makan di ruangan dingin.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Mega Wati
text: Makanan nya enak², stafnya ramah, bisa ketemu langsung dengan Bu Rudy yang ramah, bahkan bisa berfoto dengan Bu Rudy nya. Sukses & sehat selalu Bu Rudy. AMIN

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Petty Wulandari
text: Tempat nya luas dan bersih. Makanan enak. Recommended untuk kumpul keluarga maupun teman kerja. Top👍👍👍

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Dina Nurdiani
text: Enaaak! Sambalnya mantep, porsinya juga lumayan banyak.. dan disini juga ada toko oleh-olehnya jadi bisa makan sambil cari oleh-oleh. Rekomended banget deh pokoknya!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: kristo kepler
text: Untuk makan disini lumayan enak dan banyak menu juga, dan ada beberapa oleh" Juga

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Erfandi Bastian
text: Pusatnya oleh-oleh Kota Surabaya y disini  ini. Mantap lah banyak menu makanan, jajanan pasar.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Seonho Shin
text: 3층 음식점은 시간상 맛을 못봤고, 2층 삼발이랑 각종 인도네시아 케이크 스낵등 유명한거 다 있습니다. 가격도 공항보다 훨씬싸고 일부 맛보기 코너도 있음. 삼발의 경우 3층 음식점에서 맛보고 사는걸 추천. 마늘 참치 오징어등등 한국 젓갈처럼 종류마다 맛이 다름

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Sakon Anantachat
text:
ศูนย์อาหารและของฝากครบวงจร

สร้างเป็นตึก3ชั้น
ชั้นล่าง จอดรถ
ชั้นสอง ขายของฝาก สารพัดของฝาก ยิ่งใหญ่มาก ทั้งแบรนด์ตัวเอง ทั้งของเจ้าอื่น รวบรวมไว้ในที่เดียว
ชั้นสาม ศูนย์อาหาร เปิดเช้า กว้างขวาง สะอาด อาหารเยอะมาก หลากหลายสุดๆ นั่งทานหรือนำกลับบ้านได้หมดเลย แค่เดินดูก็เลือกไม่ถูกแล้ว🤣มีอยู่ท้องเดียว🤣

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Henni Tanjanri
text: A Surabaya legend that never disappoints. The nasi campur with empal and sambal was flavorful, and the variety of side dishes and gorengan is impressive. The place is spacious, clean, and has a lively atmosphere. Great spot if you want to enjoy authentic East Javanese food with lots of options to choose from.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Yosef Mario Chalim
text:
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ A True Gem for East Javanese Cuisine Lovers!

Depot Bu Rudy is an absolute must-visit for anyone craving authentic East Javanese flavors. The place is spacious and comfortable, with a warm and inviting interior that blends traditional charm with modern touches. Everything is spotless — from the dining area to the neatly arranged tables — making the dining experience even more pleasant.

The menu offers an impressive variety of East Javanese specialties, each prepared with authentic seasoning and mouthwatering aroma. I highly recommend their Nasi Campur Udang Empal Special — the combination of tender empal, savory shrimp, and perfectly cooked rice is simply unforgettable. The Nasi Peda is equally amazing, bursting with rich, spicy flavor. Don’t miss the Pisang Goreng Wijen — crispy on the outside, soft and sweet on the inside, with a delightful sesame crunch.

Every dish is a true taste of home-cooked perfection, served in generous portions and presented beautifully. Service is friendly and efficient, making you feel truly welcomed. I will definitely come back again and again!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: sofia
text:
This place offers a great selection of traditional Indonesian dishes, and it’s clearly a local favorite — the place was busy but well-organized. We tried several items and really enjoyed the sup asem, es puding, and pisang goreng madu. Everything was flavorful and freshly made.

There’s plenty of seating, and even with the crowd, service was quick and efficient. The menu has a wide variety, including lodeh, penyetan, and soups, perfect for those wanting to explore authentic flavors.

Parking is convenient with a large basement area, and the public restrooms are clean and accessible. Don’t miss the souvenir shop downstairs, it’s in a strategic spot and offers a nice selection of local goodies.

Overall, a satisfying experience with delicious food, friendly service, and thoughtful facilities. Definitely worth a visit!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Yanuar Rifai
text: I couldnt review the restaurant just because order for souvenir only. The best things here are the sambal with many style and taste. The sambals still taste fresh up to 3 days after opening the jar. But better save it inside refrigerator and combine with hot rice when you want to eat.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Boe Didiet
text: The restaurant is on top level. Level 2 is for the market, to get some snacks or souvenirs. Parking is on Level 1. There is an elevator so it's accessible for seniors or handicapped person.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Tofu writer (Lisa)
text: well no  complaint at all about the food ya, so satisfied seriously,would love to go there again

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: S F
text:
A feast of Indonesian taste
Delicious and authentic traditional food and snacks

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Elyna Shakira
text: Bangunan terdiri daripada 3 lantai. Memang besar. Ada banyak jenis ole-ole &  puas hatilah kalau nak shopping. Sambal bawang botolan bu rudy a bit dissapointed me. Kebanyakannya masam walaupun seal belum dibuka. Padahal tu sambal andalan mereka. Sambal bajak & ijo botolan takde masalah pulak. Makanan kat restaurant bu rudy memang best. Sambal bawang fresh boleh refill banyak kali ! Rujak cingur kebanyakan petis so agak kureng for me. Pisang madu agak keras walaupun rasanya enak.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Yu Quan Yeo
text: Bu Rudy serves impeccable Indonesian food, and their chilli is truly to-die-for. Although the service was quick, the food was bursting with flavour. The warm and friendly lady boss constantly went around the restaurant welcoming and interacting with diners, which made the dining experience even better. I enjoyed the food so much that after the meal, I immediately went to their departmental store located below the restaurant to purchase several bottles of their famous Chilli.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Edy Nurkiswoyo
text: The food are delicious, we had Nasi Campur Udang Special which comprise of crispy deep fried baby prawns, fermented bokcoy, empal (fried beef), sunny side up and serundeng (sweet and spicy stir fry grated coconut). And their Pisang Goreng Madu (honey banana fritters) is a must try! However the place is not that cool as it’s an open space restaurant so it could get quite hot when it’s fully packed with customers

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: maya RF
text:
This new store is located right next to the original store. More well-organized and modern, it focuses mainly on souvenirs (Bu Rudy's products and snacks from other regions in Java). However, there are several food stalls there too.
There is a city bus line (R4) from Bungurasih bus terminal to Depot Bu Rudy Dharmahusada. Fare is only 5K. Nearest bus stop is 50 metres away.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Rahman Hakim
text: Worth to try, better atmospher depend on your lunch/dinner time.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Jo Johannes
text:
A must go when you in surabaya
Place to buy souvenirs and snacks for your relatives
The restaurant also delicious with so many varieties traditional food

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Michael Liauw
text: This place serves good, authentic East Javanese food, from old classic Nasi campur and Nasi level, to special Nasi Madura and Lontong Cap Gomeh. They also have lots of traditional snack - pisang goreng madu, perkedel jagung and tahu pong are crowd favourite. If you’re into sambal, they make their own chilli - very spicy and famous, they sell it in bottles and make a good souvenir!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Chintya M
text:
- This place is huge, with a restaurant and a snacks store in the same building.
- We ordered the "Nasi Campur Spesial" and "Nasi Bakar Tuna". Both dishes were delicious. I particularly loved their sambal bawang, which we could also purchase in their snacks store.
- The prices are reasonable and the staff were friendly. We arrived around 4pm local time and the restaurant was quite crowded, but the service was quick.
- The place was also clean and cozy. Highly recommended!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Vicky Primandani
text:
Best spot for lunch in Surabaya.

Their new building is very huge & sophisticated with industrial minimalist concept. The building itself consists of 3 level.
- Ground floor is for parking area.
- 1st floor is for Pusol (Pusat Oleh-oleh)
- 2nd floor is for dining & kitchen
- 3rd floor is for musholla

They offers A LOT of menu variant. I tried nasi udang empal special. It consists of udang crispy, empal gepuk, telur dadar & sayur asin. Sayur asin is not my cup of tea, other than that it was good. Their sambal bawang also nice to accompany your dining.

Beside main dish, you must try their side dish as well. Tahu pong & pisang goreng madu is recommended. It taste so good and freshly fried.

Dining area is very huge. But still it will be very crowded during lunch time. The same with Pusol, they offers lots of oleh-oleh from all accross East Java.

During peak time, you might be not getting parking space on ground floor building, but there are parking man that will assist you to park your car around the building.

If you visit Surabaya, Depot Bu Rudy is must visit place for lunch.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Tanti Rosalia
text:
"This place is one of the legendary culinary spots in Surabaya. It started as a small food stall, but now it has transformed into a modern three-story building featuring a restaurant, a hall, and a souvenir market offering Bu Rudy's specialties and other Surabaya snacks.

The restaurant is quite comfortable with a spacious seating area, although it's always busy. They offer a variety of Indonesian dishes that feel very homey. I tried the nasi bakar tuna, nasi campur udang krispi, and their famous pisang goreng madu. Overall, the food isn’t particularly special—it simply feels like home-cooked meals, but thats why we always want to come again..
Bu Rudy herself is very energetic and adds a lively vibe to the place

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Adrian Hartanto Setiadi
text:
I visited Pusol Bu Rudy on January 27, 2023. Hopefully, this review is still relevant by the time I post it.

Since it had been a while since I visited Depot Bu Rudy in Dharmahusada, I decided to go there and buy some Sambal Bu Rudy. But to my surprise, it was no longer a Depot but had turned into Pusol. This tall building with four floors has an elevator, and the dining area is located on the third floor, while the rest are shops and meeting rooms. Here, the fried dishes are more complete than other branches such as in Pasar Atom. The menu is also varied, and the place is spacious.

Overall, even though it was my first time visiting this new place, it certainly won't be my last.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Yulianto Maliang
text: The legendary Nasi Empal Udang Bu Rudy, a new restaurant place with gift shop in the 2nd floor, 3rd floor and 4th floor is their Restaurant. Ground floor they are made it into a car park, ussually we always got difficulty to park the car outside cause of lack of car parking space. Their menu is more indonesian food menu, which is has good taste and good price.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Ze da
text: the grocery is clean, the place is comfortable, the location and placement of each product is neat. the building just moved from the previous location which was bigger, but parking is also still difficult because it is so crowded with visitors. the typical food recommendations are dried shrimp and onion chili sauce

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Jinu Hwang
text:
나시 짬뿌르 먹었습니다.
삼발이 너무 맛있네요 ㅠ 삐상고랭두여..
잘 정비 된 위생 시스템으로 맛난 자와음식을 드시려면 이곳을 꼭 가보셔야 합니다 👍🏿

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: phimatra jaya
text: I stopped by Depot Bu Rudy again — always my go-to place for their legendary sambal! The location is great with spacious indoor parking across three levels, so no stress finding a spot. The place is clean, well-organized, and the staff is friendly. Perfect for dining in or picking up their famous sambal as a takeaway gift. The sambal still tastes amazing — just the right level of spiciness and super addictive. Definitely a must-visit when you’re in Surabaya!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Yanly Riky
text:
Depot Bu Rudy is a local legend in Surabaya, known far and wide by both locals and tourists for its exceptional sambal and delicious rice dishes. The restaurant offers a wide range of meals that are not only affordable but also come in generous portions, making it a great value for the quality of food you get. The atmosphere is welcoming, and the staff is always attentive and friendly, adding to the overall experience.

I had the pleasure of trying their Nasi Campur Udang, and it didn’t disappoint. The prawns were of great quality—crispy on the outside and tender on the inside. They paired perfectly with their signature sambal, which really takes the flavor to another level. The combination of textures and bold flavors made it a standout dish, and I can see why Depot Bu Rudy has such a strong following.

With its affordable prices, delicious food, and a team of cheerful staff, Depot Bu Rudy is a must-visit for anyone in Surabaya. Whether you’re a local or a tourist, it’s the perfect place to enjoy a satisfying meal with that authentic sambal kick!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Khairul Habib
text: A place to go for authentic surabaya food. Nice ambient, good food, great service, good variety of menu. You can taste bold spice and strong aroma for each food. Sambal has extra garlic arome, lodeh has a smoke arome, its a real food pleasure.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: enggar alfianto
text: Menurut lidah saya, rasa makanan dibandingkan dengan harga cenderung kurang. Tempat nya bagus, oleh-oleh nya lengkap.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Asih P
text: The food is delicious, so crowded but the food was served fast. The place has a prayer room. It also has supermarket for Indonesian snacks

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Hendra Wiraatmaja
text:
A must place to visit when in surabaya!
This third times my visit in Bu Rudy.

The food is famous in town, like nasi empal udang and they have their own sambal, sambal bu rudy, very2 hot and delicious.

The resto quite crowded at noon, have a car parking besides the resto, have restroom.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Claudio Denta
text: Its best place if you love authentic javanese food, in this restaurant you can find so many food from javanese especially in surabaya such as pecel, nasi bakar, penyetan and many more. You can also get homemade canned food for your beloved at home. So if you want some surabaya feel for, you must visit this place

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Farras AM
text:
Depot bu rudy is a famous restaurant and place to buy snacks and gifts originated from Surabaya. Every single time i go here, i've never seen this place not packed with people, here's always busy.
There are so many different kind of snacks, so take as long as you like to find the right thing to buy, but don't forget to check on the price. You can asked the workers to pack everything you buy, they're very helpful.

Their signature is Sambal bawang and udang (condiment and crispy shrimp), they have 3 kinds of condiments and the waiter said it will last up till a month from its production day. They also have traditional indonesian snacks like onde-onde, surabi, bika ambon, and every other name you can thing of :")
Their restaurant also serve menus originated from East java, like Pecel Madiun (mixed boiled veggies with peanut sauce), Nasi udang empal (rice with crispy shrimp, beef, and condiment), Penyetan (fried foods serve with condiment) and so on. There's a vegetarian menu too, so at least if you're a vegetarian you still be able to eat here. Mostly the foods are spicy, a typical of east java food.

Lastly, the parking space is huge enough and usually there's a man who will help you park your car/motor bike

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Alvin D
text: One of the famous places to eat among local tourists.  Here provides a variety of typical Surabaya menus and there is a souvenir center in the same place

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Romico Mico
text:
First time in Surabaya and Dine in for breakfast after train ride from malang.

Location was on the main street of dharmahusada, parking slot they have quite a lot.

Elevator for accommodate customers for easy access for higher floor.

The food was good, we order "nasi campur" the price IDR 32.000/portion. And the ice tea was huge 🤣.

You can also buy oleh-oleh here.

Everything in here was good and the price is reasonable.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Zahro Kariima
text:
Damn! My sister and I had a perfect brunch here. Fantastic experience, the rice with empal gepuk and dried shrimp fit perfectly in every single way, the service was excellent.
You can also take home a slice of Surabaya with edible souvenirs that will jolt memories of your gastronomical adventure here with every bite. My favorites: sambal bawang, almond crispy, and spekkoek.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Lita Rahmawati
text: I went to this place just because I transited from Bali to Yogyakarta. I went here also because this is one of the most popular restaurants in Surabaya. I am happy with the taste and for me the price is reasonable, it is clean. However I wasnt really happy with the service because the staff suppose to give smile but yeah they didnt do it. I ordered nasi pecel and their sambal is really good indeed.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: James Ridwan
text: Famous for its sambal / chili sauce, also the place for craving local Surabaya food (although maybe just a little adjustment for the taste, not as spicy as the street food version) 😀

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: iussoe
text: The best sambal in town..we also can find a lot of great snacks..such as honey fried banana,fried sweet potato etc..great place to eat!!!..now they open a new store dedicated to selling much more variety of snacks from micro small local enterprises..they also build lots of parking space in the ground floor..nicee

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: AZ.adventurer
text: All food served are delicious, unfortunately today is very crowded... at 2 p.m. only a few menu left. My favorite to take away is sambal bu Rudy

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Dinda A R
text: Service was very fast. I ordered “nasi udang empal”, and it’s only take like 10 minutes for them to serve. You get a free flow “sambel bawang”, their famous “sambal”

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Dicky Firmansyah A.
text: It is one of the good local restaurants in Surabaya. Mostly selling East Javanese culinary. All the best to Bu Rudy restaurant

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Greg
text: Cool atmosphere and super fast service. Very reasonable prices, and a little tranquility amongst the surrounding chaos.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Agung Rachmanto
text:
BEST! Tried it once many years ago and fell in love with the food. So everytime I come to Surabaya, I will surely eat here.
Nasi udang empal, best!. Reasonable price and homemade taste.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Mariati Manullang
text:
The great place and foods when you travelling to Surabaya.
My first time, to try "nasi udang Bu Rudi"", and i love it. Very recomended.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Arini Wisesa
text: The sambal is so famous, we can having lunch here and buy some souvenir and gift.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Ignatius Setiawan
text: Sambal bawang dengan citarasa yg luarbiasa, Bu Rudy sendiri turun ke lapangan untuk menyapa pelanggan. Pelayanan cepat dan ramah. Di gedung yang sama terdapat pusat oleh oleh surabaya.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Raufan Purdini Harahap
text:
Perhaps the most popular Depot Bu Rudy in Surabaya.
The place was really comfortable and nice. It has a lot of parking space.
Hence, the food is really great (especially Rawon 👍)

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Prima
text: Tempat lengkap buat cari oleh2 sekalkan makan

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Hendra Wicaksono
text: I have to say, I enjoyed every single bite of the meal. I had a 3 course east java meals. Considering the quality, the price is reasonable. There was also VIP room for bigger groups. I recommend to everyone! I would like to come back here again and again.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Aris Fazilah
text: Great, variety, excellent quality and fairly priced with a nice gift shop downstairs made our visit worthwhile.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Jessica Leonardo
text: Tried their famous crispy shrimp + empal set, it comes with very delicious preserved vege and beansprouts side (kinda sweet, a little bit spicy) i love the crispy shrimps. Not a huge fan of the empal though, it comes with a marinated hard boiled egg, kerupuk as well. Best part is the SAMBEL!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Muhammad Nashrul Haqqi
text: Actually it is simple Javanese traditional dish consist of fried shrimp, empal, and srundeng. It seems that this menu always served in clean and consistent manner, so could made it became popular. The sambal also has special point 😘😁

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: John
text:
Surabaya駐在時代、頻繁に通っていました！
サンバルが本当に美味しいです。
ジャカルタに住んでいるインドネシア人に、ここのお土産のサンバルを持っていくと、「美味しい！」と大変喜んでくれました。

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Dian Prakoso
text: Cita rasa masakan Jawa yang medhok dan otentik. Fully-packed during lunchtime most definitely. Ueaanak wis pokoke.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Binar Binari Ahya
text: Good place to buy gifts for your friends and family from Surabaya. You can dine in too, and you must try "nasi bakar" it's so good

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Esther K
text:
Spacious and one stop place.
1st floor. Parking
2nd floor.  All you need for buying the sambal and snacks (oleh-oleh)
3rd floor. Don’t come here super hungry or you might order everything because all look delicious

They provide corrugated packing for your stuff that you bought. So convenient.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Agustina PN
text: Komplit, banyak pilihan oleh2. Sambal dan nya tetap pilihan utama

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Cendera Wirawan
text: A nice place to dine and shop. A lot of food varieties.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Yuni Arrahmah
text:
Indonesia meals are often multifaceted.
And this is a restaurant that signature flavors include hits of chili, subtly smooth notes of coconut, citrus zings, etc

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Siti Nuraisyah Suwanda
text: This place is legendary. The sambal (traditional hot sauce) is legendary, especially the sambal bawang. Also you can see Bu Rudy herself wanders around and helps to work. She's super humble. One of the must visit places in Surabaya!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Amel Desain
text: One of surabaya’s legend culinary, must try nasi empal udang telur and lodeh iwak pe!! Portion is small though, but the tase is unforgettable!! You can eat sambal as much as you can!! And dont forget to buy kue lumpur here, i believe ita kue lumpur peneleh the legend one too…

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Mariana Lestari
text:
New, clean and located in the main road
Fast response thru WA

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Harry B
text: My fav spot in town. Traditional food with modern flare. Clean, crisp and yumm

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Swastedy Prasetyo
text:
First visit to the new renovated building..and it's awesome 👍
The foods never lie 🤩🥰👍👍👍👍👍

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Gita Liony
text: Pertama kali ke sini suasananya super duper ramee tp untuk makanan di resto.masio rame ojok khawatir cuepeett poll pelayanan e. Regone pikir ku bakal luarang soale panggone super duper nyaman. Tibake biasa standart poll regone. Tp rasane duh tak paringi bintang 10 teko 10 nek 100 yo teko 100.. duh rawon e wenakkk polllll daging e masio onok kotot e lohh tp uenakkkkk empukkk.. gak paham enaknya

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Haryadhi Adhi
text: The owner, Mrs. Rudy, is friendly to customers and provides a way to eat tofu with the chili sauce. Many choices of food and drinks at affordable prices

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: irawati liem
text: nice place to enjoy food , many choice of javanese food and nice drinks. in the second floor they sell snacks and all kinds of sambal etc.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: divine '
text: Great place to eat Surabayan food. Clean and the service is nice.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Yulia Natania
text:
This place is big and very convenient.
If you looking for a place to buy souvenir and snacks from Surabaya, this might be a great place for you.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Aditya Yoastara
text: A great variety of Jawa Timur food is served here. As an icon of Surabaya.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Joe Felus
text: It says they're closed at 9 P.M. we were there at 8:30 but they already started cleaning up and not that many options available. The food we had was good, but it coud be better if we did not have "leftover"  Pisang goreng madu was suoer oily. I did not finish it and threw away the rest.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: avidsingaporean
text:
There are plenty of traditional options available for Indonesian delicacies, and the atmosphere and parking have improved a lot since the early pandemic.

Overall, would want to come here again!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Timothy Chandra
text: Nice place, nice food, nice people and nice services.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Meyriana Kesuma
text: never forget to spend my time to cullinary at Depot Bu Rudy. The genuine of local taste and the place to find some snack to bring back home..

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: fachrie dian sidik
text: Good lah

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Lina Setiomiguno
text: the food is excellent.. the service also quite fast..

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Lobelia Asmaul Husna
text: The food is great with various type. You can visit this place if you want to have something from Surabaya.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Dhany Purwanto
text: Deserves a status of legendary food of Surabaya. Be sure to try the sambal provided on the table (as long as you have no diet restriction).

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Diorita Dyah Prayanti
text: Must visit when you're in Surabaya. This nasi udang empal is signature dish from Bu Rudy.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: indraracing
text: never missed the favorit meals here

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Derwin Hendra
text: Food taste is yummy, Surabaya food please try "nasi empal udang special". Available smoking and non-smoking area. And you can buy some traditional snack or food...

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Meilisa Dewi
text: One of the best lontong cap go meh in Surabaya. Affordable as well.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Gede Bagus Bayu Pentium
text: Great Sambal, must try if you visit Surabaya.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: M. Fuad Q. Alam
text:
Thank you bu Rudy's restaurant staff to keep our daughter's wallet when its left during our visit.
Warmest regards..

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: John Sinulingga
text: Buat yang mau pulang, Bu Rudy menjadi pilihan untuk oleh-oleh. Aneka ragam oleh -oleh yang disediakan di tempat ini.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Jo Ro
text:
I have been a loyal customer in Bu Rudy. Always a pleasure to come in and eat in.. but today takes the cake. A stellar example of service and it shows in my satisfaction review here.

"Pedas-Nikmat" food, the special nasi udang platter is extremely delish. Always will bring my guests and friends here to enjoy the delectable cuisine offered here.

My pregnant wife wanted to eat here but can't stand food smell (women..) anyway, the staffs very accommodating about the whole ordeal. Including putting my wife in a place outside but where no smokers around. I really appreciate the gesture. Thru it all, they have shown incredible attitude and attention.

Food is great as always. The service is amazing. 5 out of 5. Keep it up!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Suhairi Suhadah
text: Ni e food

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Bagus Widyanto
text: A decent East Javanese style eatery.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Agus MK
text: One of must try Surabaya Local Food 👍👍🤤

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Muhammad Dimas Ekoprasetyo
text: This place sells the famous onion sambals in Surabaya. And also this place open for lunch. You can have rice mixed with little fried prawn and slow-cooked meat. It is very tasty and unique. And also they sell other foods, spices, and traditional snack and offer packaging service if you buys in certain amount and quantity.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Chandra Tjahjadi
text: Great food, Great price, Fast service, Cozy place. Chilli paste is tasty too.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Irawan Prasetyo
text:
Depot Bu Rudi nang embong Dharmahusada onok rong panggon, sing kulon iku depot lawase kusus digawe andhok sego urang, empal sak penunggale ..
Lha lek sg etan iku bangunan anyar tingkat telu digawe mall pusat oleh-oleh, isine lumayan komplit produk gawenane UMKM.. onok cemilan karo omben2.. saiki yo onok produk kaos, klambi, batik, tas ambek asesoris dideleh ng pojokan mburi.
Sing ngisor dewe gawe parkiran, lek ape munggah onok pilihan numpak lift utowo menek ondo.
Sing terasan lantai siji onok rombong2 bakul panganan, isok andhok ambek ngrasakno semilir angin sg nggarai ngantuk.
Kesimpulane .. lek golek cemilan, kaos, batik khas Suroboyo utowo kangen mbadhog sego urange Bu Rudi .. monggo mlipir dijamin gak nggarai getun .. iku JAREKU lho Rek 👍🏽👍🏽
Sepurane lali gak moto2 🙏😁🤭

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: N. Rizky A.
text:
+
Sambele ya Allah enak nemen.
Porsine lumayan wakeh, nek sing maeme gak patio akeh njaluk dikalongi segane.
Njajal menu udang empal, agak gak masuk seh kombinasi urang ambek daging. Tapi yo enak wae.
-
Rodo kapusan, menu minume tulisane dawet jebul cendol

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Vivian Vivian
text: Their pecel n nasi bakar are great, very very cheap n big portion. Perfect for lunch

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Albert Tedjadiputra
text:
This is one of the places that must be visited when looking for unique Surabaya style delicacies and souvenirs.
Mrs. Rudy has created the legendary crispy shrimp and its unique got chilli.
By shopping in this location you will find many different varieties of local small shops produce that are scattered around Indonesia, but especially in the Eastern Java region.
Parking is at the ground level with the lifts to take you upstairs to the food court and the shop.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: ig gut vel
text: Increíble, comer por 1 euro

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: No Ar
text:
Wenn Ihr in Surabaya seid und Hunger habt, dort vorbei schauen. Sieht wie ein altes Indon. Lokal aus. Die Speisen sind wirklich gut. Die Besitzerin ist Chinesin aber die Küche ist gemischt
Mittag ist es Rammelvoll aber die Bedienung ist schnell und das Essen rasch am Tisch. Nachbestellungen sind unproblematisch. Beim hinausgehen gibt es viele verschiedene Jajan basar. Kleinigkeiten gefüllt mit Gemüse. Wie vor 20 Jahren. Einmaliger Geschmack. Preiswert sowieso
Das Beste sind die Sambal. Verschiedene Sorten. Die Leute kommen dafür von weit her. Bu Rudi hat noch 2 Filialen. Das ist das Hauptgeschäft

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Reno Raphael Yang
text: The best food if you love spicy food in Surabaya, especially the nasi empal udang

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Fanny Soesilo
text:
I love the unique spicy taste!
Its not only just depot/restaurant for me but this is the heritage of surabaya, its already like recreation in the middle of pandemic coz we can find many food & culinary here which is very interesting!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Julia
text: 1st floor for gifts shop! 2nd floor for dine! I love 1st floor. Can see sooo much gifts such snacks, sambal, cake, cookies, chips, instant drinks, keychain, and many others. The shopkeeper is kind. Gifts on affordable price. Have packing corner that can send ur package to your home or friends or other island.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Far East
text: This is a well known restaurant in Surabaya. They serve a signature chilly sauce with fried shrimp. It also serves tofu, fried banana (which really tasty), and many other traditional snacks. Foods, snacks, drinks and tangible here are recomended. Many famous people of Indonesia have been here.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Hendro Santoso
text:
Tempat yg Nyaman, Rasa Makanan nya jga Enak....
Utk Harga masih Wajar Buat Depot Legend ini...
Buat nongkrong ya masih Asyik lah...

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Pongky Andriyan
text: 1 of historical restaurant at Surabaya, good choice for people who love spicy food. Price relative normal, because we can eat sambal as much as we want. Really crowded when lunch time. Outlet with many home made products available there. Updated parking area capacity, around 70+ vechiles

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: S H
text: Great place for breakfast, lunch, dinner or even having snacks, or buy oleh-oleh

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Robby Jauwerissa
text:
must visit if you go to this city.
soo many kinds of Indonesian food you can find here, you can also find many snacks as a gift that you can buy.
and all tasted good

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Septian Dwi Rahadi
text:
well known for their famous Sambal Bu Rudy, this is favourite place to shop souvenir in Surabaya. you can but not only product from traditional food like sambal, chips but also SME like Dawet, Pukis etc outside the store

theres also package station so you need no worry to bring your groceries to mass trasportation like train or plane

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Sita Sidharta
text:
Nasi campur Bu Rudy is one of the best in Surabaya, particularly if you can handle 'sambal pedas'. It's already a good nasi campur but the sambal elevates it to the next level.

Tbere's the oleh-oleh store downstairs where you can buy sambal bu rudy in bottles and other yummy snacks. Very handy if you couldn't get to the proper oleh-oleh store.

definitely worth a visit when you're in Surabaya.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Randy Ansari Nur Hidayat
text: Nasi Campur Empal Udang is the best.  The taste is very authentic, the crispy prawns are very crunchy, the beef is very tender, and there is serundeng which makes this food more complex, and when we eat here we can eat bu rudy's sambal bawang as much as we like.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Dicky Indrawan
text: One stop shopping area authentic by Bu Rudy, a legendary Surabaya culinary. 1st floor for the shopping area, 2nd floor for restaurant, 3rd floor for function hall and musholla. Parking is available in the basement. Various snacks and food are available, including Bu Rudy Brands. You can try tradisional food in resto; please try Nasi Udang Empal Special or Nasi Campur Special. Taste is matched with the price, good service, big space, clean, and comfort.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: danny tjandra
text: I like how their food tasted. I also like how they portioned their food (not too much rice). Also important to me, is having consistent quality of food. Their marketplace at the second floor also have a lot of different choices.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Silvia Jhonatan
text: Always love this place everytime I go to Sby..

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Ossie Andromeda
text: Great place, great food, but the food size is too small for me. The sambal bu rudy taste so good. Not too spicy, but still tingles in my mouth. Love the pisang goreng and nangka goreng, you should try one of those two. The sweetness is very good, the texture is great, the crunchy is so good.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Rizky Adidharma - Riplay Studio
text:
Famous Surabaya Restaurant, has selection of great food and very famous of the onion super spicy sambal.

Cons: When it gets crowded the staff can't handle it, we as the customer must compete to get the seat, they should make queue number or something

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Rivai Aja
text: Locates in city center and just opposite the fuel station and other culinary depots. This depot offers variety of traditional menus.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Christian Bradley Andre
text: You've got two in a place: food for eat, food for gifts

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Andrew Christian
text: It's a convenient restaurant and offers delicious foods & drinks. This restaurant also sells the most delicious chilli sauce in Surabaya. In front of the restaurant has many kind of vendors who sell typical food of Surabaya. So, it's a great place to hang out with family or friends.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Soegianto Ali
text: New location just a few house away from the old one. This new location has 3 storage building. First floor is for the parking space, 2nd floor for selling typical foods for souvenir. Quite an extensive selection. The third floor is for the restaurant.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Eko Permodo
text: Good place. The portion is huge for some people. The price is relatively high for Surabaya. Parking slot not so big.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Rivaldo Juan
text: This the recommended souvenir center at the town! Very complete of food that can be brought as your souvenir for your family and friend! So many choice to decide which one you want to pick! 5/5

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Fadriani Fariawan
text: This place is always busy, not only during lunchtime, but they manage to get us table. I love sambal bawang (garlicky chilly). I think the sambal will surely enhanced every tasty main course they have. Should try their ambula juice, so refreshing.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Andy Kristono
text:
30 June 2022, I visited this place, I was surprised. Last year I visited pusol Bu Rudy was quite small, but this time nice and bigger new building near the old one.

It has special parking area below the store. And has a prayer room / mushola on 3rd floor.

The store on 2nd floor is well managed , then we can find various food easily. And we can eat there also at it's canteen. Prices are various , cheaper food until expensive one, we can choose what we need.

Nice store.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Jason Aditya
text: Great food, simple but delicious. A must-come if you enjoy great and unique sambal you can't find anywhere else. Here you can also find various kinds of small bites like tahu pong, pisang goreng, and many others.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Chris Barbour
text: Great food

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Imelda Nita Saputri
text:
Coming from out of town, I had nasi pecel for brunch.
It was soooo gooooddd, especially if you're a fan of hot sambal!
The vegetables were fresh, the pecel sauce tastes thick & spicy just the way I like. The crunchy shrimp added some pleasure to the meal. They put their signature sambal on your table, feel free to eat to your heart's (and stomach) content :)
They have a wide selection of menu, you won't have nothing to choose.
They sell various sambal & snacks etc too, for you to bring home.
How I wish they would open a restaurant too here in my hometown.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Mikael Budi Ariyanto
text:
Taste good, even it is spicy, you can still tasting the ingrediants...
And it's served well.

The place easy to find, just type pusol bu Rudy... i
Pusol stand for pusat oleh oleh, located just next to the bank ...

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Marini Akmal
text: This place is quite famous in this town, that's the reason i must try the famous sambal Bu Rudy. And no lie the sambal is really good with the crunchy shrimps, you must try if you go there. This place also sell like oleh-oleh like cake or snack made in surabaya from some brand and the test all really good. If you buy many oleh-oleh you'll get free of charge packing. And if you're lucky you'll serve by Bu Rudy and she's really humble person.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: ヴァムレオ
text: It's getting better and better every week. Tasted also same and good, full of camilan/oleh oleh Suroboyo an. Have to visit when in Surabaya.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Dony Lim
text:
Too hungry to take the food picture, no comment. All food are taste good here! 😋
Tried their Nasi Campur Udang Kering 👍

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Harianto Kang
text:
Went there with my parents, wife and kids. The restaurant serve a lot of Javanese food variance. We try rawon but the meat are to hard to chewed by my 5-year daugther, nasi pecel campur, nasi campur and nasi campur udang with great taste. We like it.

You sould try their menus when you go to Surabaya.

They sell many variance of snacks as well

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Giana Ang
text: The best Culinary spot in Surabaya. One of the most place must visit when you in Surabaya. You'll get excite when you enjoy every dish served, and you'll be proud when you buy oleh-oleh for your family, colleague,etc.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Steven Kurniawan
text: Great destination if you're looking for local food or gifts (in the form of cookies, chili paste, and dry food). Price is a bit pricey but service and product quality is enough to make up for it. They have a free cardboard packaging service if you buy in bulk.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: V A
text: Will go to jkt n my friends gimme 1mio to buy this sambal wkkw

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Dyah “Dy”
text: You can find all the souvenirs here, especially sambal Bu Rudy and the crispy shrimp, which are always reliable. And don't forget to taste of Pisang Goreng Madu.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: ilham
text: LOVE THE SAMBAL. IT'S THE BEST SAMBAL I HAVE EVER HAD IN MY LIFE. They provide various traditional food of east java like pecel nasi bakar and so on. It's near to stasiun gubeng, only 2 kms away. You can buy sambal as souvenir the price quite affordable, 26K rupiah per bottle. They also sell lapis kukus and other various snack.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Virlina Virly
text: Great place, nice food but so crowded..

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Mawanda Almuhayar
text: Perfect place when you are looking for food souvenirs from Surabaya. Also there is a place to eat here (restaurant). But sadly it just opened until 17.00. Should be open at night!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Joni Gunawan
text: Very delicious indonesian food resto, especially javanese spicy food. Their special nasi udang, nasi udang empal, and nasi campur is the best with their special chilli called " sambal". Must try if u like spicy food with reasonable price

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: darma mulya
text: The restaurant infront of main road , there's a spesious parking lot and beside the restaurant. The food is very nice traditional taste, the employee is polite and there is many kind of traditional delicious snack..and the sambal...(spicy chili sauce) many variant...pervecto

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Gibran Makarim Muhammad
text: A must visit place for you to eat or just buy some souvenir of Surabaya! A decent selection of food and a dozen selection of souvenir from sweet to savoury. Would recommend you to buy the famous Sambal Bu rudy for you spicy food lover!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Hakim Hauston
text: A lot of varieties of snacks for sale here, come here if you are running out of time to search for snacks throughout the city. Price is more expensive than if source it out individually elsewhere. They also have their own house brand which is not available elsewhere though

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Abyan Irzaldy
text: Very good food with Bu Rudi's signature sambal. Spicy. Very crowded. It also offer you traditional snacks and foods. Overall it is a must visit restaurant when you go to Surabaya.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Setyowati Soewandi
text:
A lot of choices of popular Indonesian food. Also the place to buy famous Surabaya's snack (Oleh2 khas Surabaya)
Open from 7 am, make a good place for breakfast catch up with friends or after morning walk.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Grace Oktosia
text: Make sure you come here with empty stomach because you might be eat a lot in here. Haha. They sell many of food, most of them is Bu Rudy speciality such as Tahu Pong, Nasi Udang, Nasi Bakar. Just ask the waiters for the special menu of the day, sometimes they cook something seasonal. Enjoy

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: iCE audioworks
text: My favourite Sambal Bawang since 8 years ago

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Irvan
text: Been selling foods since a long time ago, a little bit crowded on lunch time and breakfasttime, need to improve on the parking space, because a lot of cars park on the sideways, nice food, a lot of variety of traditional foods, their specialty is “nasi empal udang with sambal”

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Michael Yang
text: Very good taste, worth to visit.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: M. Rifki Rosady
text: New restaurant in new building, many of foods and beverages, easily to reach and parking .... you can try the special hot chili ... it's legendary ... called by SAMBAL Bu. RUDY

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Reinaldo Ongky
text: Sangat ramai dan banyak pilihan menu yang enak. Disini juga menyediakan oleh oleh untuk para pendatang dari luar kota

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Septiyan Firmansyah
text: Buat oleh-oleh keluarga di rumah, sambal Bu Rudy selalu jadi pilihan utama kalau ke Surabaya

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Prananda Navitas
text: Super friendly staff, great food and atmosphere. Keep an eye out for Bu Rudy greeting customers and making sure they receive the best service. Can't wait to come again!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Yanuar Sanjaya
text:
One of the authentic foods and snacks in Surabaya. The most popular menu is nasi udang (prawn rice) with various combo.

Bu Rudy sell many foods to gift to relatives or friend. Usually people buy sambal bu rudy. They also serve the packaging box for free.

If u want looking for traditional and authentic food from Surabaya, then this is the right place to go.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Venny Juliana
text: Nice food and sell many kind of snacks. You can buy chips and traditional cake / snack for daily consumption or for souvenirs. Die die must try for tourist while visiting surabaya.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Novi Faldian
text: Depot bu Rudi sell famous sambal bu Rudi and many snack and typical food from Surabaya like tahu petis, krupuk, gorengan, etc. In this place has cheepest price compare to other gift place because sambal bu Rudi produced here. Very recommended place to buy food for gift !!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Rubi Haliman
text: An iconic resto in Surabaya, serving fried shrimp with hot chilli paste as main dish.  They have snack center as well.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Wangi Wihardjo
text: always nasi usang with sambal

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Mohamad Bahtiar Rizwandha
text: It has an authentic sambal and it's so delicious

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Jacquelyn
text: A must-destination for East Java Traditional Cuisine's Lover. Also combined with their super crowded food store, offers broad range of snacks and condiments. Also known for their "Sambal Bu Rudy" with a convenient jar-bottled.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Benedict Yan Yan P
text:
Visiting Surabaya? Dont miss to buy Sambel Bu Rudy (Spicy Sauce). Offers spicy sauce with fried shrip.
But you visit the stall, you can also enjoy various menu for lunch.
Snack? Also avalaible many traditional Surabayan snack.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: widya rizky
text:
This restaurant is very crowded everyday. Especially lunch time. The shrimp rice and Bu Rudi Garlic Sambal is the autentic menu of Bu Rudy. Bu Rudy also have a store that sell autentic food of Surabaya like a Almond Crispy, Keripik Tempe, Lorjuk, etc. And they packed in cardboard for free.
The good point is Bu Rudy also accept Credit Card, Visa, Master Card, and Debit. Minimal IDR 200.000,-
The parking lot is wide for car and motorcycle.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Rini Angeliantari
text: Good to buy foods for your family. There's a resaturant too inside that serves delicious food in a reasonable price. It's not the most comfortable place to spend hours though for it's very hot and crowded

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: imandwihartanto
text: It has been some years I stop and shop at this place. Last night made me just Wow. So much have change for the best.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Matthew Steed
text: The taste of Surabaya.  Lovely restaurant and a big gift store for snacks.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Adhi Faris
text: One of the best traditional restaurants in Surabaya, nasi udang bu rudy recommended to try and don't forget to use the chili (sambal) it's very popular and legendary!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Axel Raharja
text: good place to buy souvenirs from surabaya. They sell their unique sambal bawang, sambal ijo, and sambal bajak. You could also buy the little fried prawn from here. And the price is reasonably cheap.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: FX Fendy
text: Favourite destination in Surabaya, one stop dining with various kinds of East Java traditional foods.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Ribka Simatupang
text: Bu Rudy is a legend. I think there arent any depot in Surabaya cant beat Bu Rudy. Yes their infamous sambal bawang is the star of the resto. But their dishes are also delicious. There are also a snack corner in front of the resto. Quite pricey for a depot but worth it

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Angga Fadjar Satria
text:
Sambal Bu Rudy is a must souvenir from Surabaya..
The store not only serve sambal but have  many variety's of snacks..
Even there's a restaurants..
This place always crowded during holiday..

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Fajar “Tude DXB” Darma S
text: If you want to taste the authentic and tasty east Javanese food, this is the place to go. Price are reasonable and you can find almost everything here.. food, cake, etc.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: HKhee
text: Must try the famous rice. Looks simple but taste good!!! I forgot to bring home the prawns n sambal as souvenier so don't miss out this.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Wegig Nugrahadi
text: Nice Meals with decent price. The favorite is Sambal Bu. Rudy.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Alex CS
text: Nice clean place, with a lot of tradional food choices with Bu Rudy's signature sambal 👍one of signature food in Surabaya

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Arina Pramudita
text: it is always so crowded during lunch time, better be prepared to eat with pairs of eyes wanting you to finish your meal asap. the sambal tastes great!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Agus Zen Mutaqin
text: one of best wholeculinary for east java taste. traditional sauces is most famous in Indonesia with brand Sambal Bu Rudi. This sambal can be bought off line or on line in many online marketing sites

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Mohammad Iqbal Ramadhan
text: Special souvenir in this place is sambal bu rudy, especially in onion flavour. Depend on your tastebut onion flavour is favourite taste i think.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Bill
text: One of the best indonesian cuisine, they really have authentic taste, and their food is great. And surprisingly it is not expensive.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Dinda Savitri
text: my fave "sambel" ever! all penyet menus are delicious and the price is affordable. you can buy snacks too in here.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Riccy Winata
text: Bu rudy sambal, is bomb, my favorite spicy, always take 5 stars,  always come here when I visit surabaya

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: F Daniel
text: Traditional Indonesian food restaurant that is a must place to go in Surabaya. You have to try the Nasi Bakar and for you hot-food lover, the Sambal is awesome.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: gatot irfan
text: A comfortable place to eat with family and lots of snack choices

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Aneng Hitchies
text: Hangus sejuta. HAHA. Dapatlah main spin 4x.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: DM Sumarli
text: Nice Indonesian food

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Nadine Septia
text: Loved this place! They have superb meal with such a fantastic price. A must go to place if you’re visiting Surabaya!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Yuli A W
text: Very crowded place. You could buy surabaya snack here. Well known with its authentic sambal bu Rudy (bu Rudy spicy sauce).

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Mika Kresna
text: Good place for merchandise from surabaya, dont be affraid being out of stock, this store has a lot of stocks! And they're delicious! "Sambel Ijo" is my favourite!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: y p
text: One place for your Surabaya's "oleh-oleh". It also serve a great lunch. The popular nasi udang really up to its fame

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Wilda Gunawan
text: Trying nasi empal udang added by the sambal which is really yummy.. The taste of tahu pong is too aalty for me but overall the food are 👍👍

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Ierfhan Surya
text: this is a great place to be visited if you come to Surabaya

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Vincent Setiawan
text: A signature restaurant in Surabaya, have to try their signature menu which is "Nasi Empal Udang" and fon't forget to try their own homemade sambal.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Dessy Merizona
text:
favorit banget sambel yaa...
es jeruk nya murah meriah n pake gelas segede gambreng

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Anindyo Pramudito
text: Tempat e besarrr, oleh oleh lengkappp dan tidak terlalu mahall, mantappp 👍👍

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Tonny Oscar
text: Ke sini untuk beli oleh-oleh sambal. Sesekali juga nyempatin buat makan nasi udangnya. Well.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Simon Nataneal
text: Wenakk itu sambalnyaa, sama yg paketan pake udangnya wenakk. Tempatnee luass tenan

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Rochman Hidayat
text: Popular chili sauce from Surabaya East Java , you can find Varian menu for breakfast and  lunch and the place with more item when you are looking for special snack from Surabaya.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Wisnu Wardhana
text: This place is famous for its sambal udang. But you can also find other traditional snack and cooked food to dine or take away

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: mochammad zaifudin
text: Superb. The taste is different with soto which I usually ate. Though the place is quite small but it was traded with unsual and great food.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Darma Iboy
text: Nice food good price

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Samuel Gunadi
text:
Realy Surabaya's icon for fried prawn, sambal is special for those who love super spicy.
Love it

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: yoyok nugroho
text: Great traditional food and snacks are available here. Good place for breakfast. Nasi udang with sambal is very special

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Dina Satrio
text: If you're looking for some 'oleh-oleh' and you're i  hurry, visit this place. You'll find well-known oleh2 in this place... Of course sambal bu Rudy..

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Denis Kristanda
text: Pusat jajanan tradisional lokal.... A must go place for visitor to Surabaya. Good one stop location for most local delicacy and cuisine.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Andreas SW
text: Good food

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: januarti jaya ekaputri
text: If you are a chili lover, you will need this place. The sambal is so tasty and their traditional food is also recommended.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: doddy firman rahmadi
text: The snack for gift is conplete... Taste good... Famous for its chili sauce "sambal bawang" that very tasty

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Media Wati
text: Delicious food..veru  nice sambal.. Many local foods and market snacks available here

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Hana Fadhilah
text: The most popular culinary in town

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Uchi Putri
text: Nasi udang dan sambal bawang super lekoh ya disini. One of my fav place to have lunch with family ♥

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Abi Suksmana
text: East Java local culinary, famous for its shrimp rice recipe... wide variant of products such as cakes, crackers, etc

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: W Trenggono
text: Plenty of delicious food choices available here, but I still prefer the nasi udang plus sambal

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Michael Aditya
text: The Finest, the most complete for Surabayan Traditional Snack and food, one place to represent Surabaya City finest Culinary

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Mybig. Appetite
text: Already move to the new building,very spacious,must visit for indonesian foods lovers.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Rieski Prihastuti
text: I love the sambal bawang and sambal ijo..

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Arry Marchilda
text: The food taste is good, a lot of local food in Surabaya you can find here, the service is good, fast and friendly

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Pradipto Danendro
text: Great food as always 👍🏽

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Mas Rifqi
text: Ok foods, Wide selection of menu, a place where you want to go if you want to bring gift back to your homeland. Known for their sambals

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Moch Chafidh Al Ayyubi
text: Employees were humble and willing to show the food places (not only give an instructions)

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: harunabdi harianto
text: Enak kabeh rek...

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: FAUZAN KHAIRI DHE HARUN
text: Love the sambal here. Very spicy. Always stop by when visiting surabaya

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Dinasty Limantono
text: One of surabaya famous indonesian restaurant. They also sell their signature sambal

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Dody Pod
text: nice vibes, ice Coffee is huge

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: good loyal
text: Indonesian food is served here and you can find traditional snack also

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Wiska Munandar
text: Aduhh siah urang jadi méncrét gara2 loba teuing ngadahar sambel, tapi ngeunah sih sambel si ibu ieu mah

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Bernadetta Filinia
text: I tried nasi udang empal bu rudy. It's delicious. 23k for this one.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Mohammad Wisaksono
text: Lot of choice for dine in especially penyet pari and also one stop place for oleh2

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Daris Fauzan
text: One of the best indonesian restaurant for family in Surabaya. I always visit this restaurant with my family when i am at Surabaya...

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Antony Suryadinata
text: Good food and reasonable price.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Ciekwang Wong
text: Haujek wenak jos gandos akakakakakak

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Esther Nofri
text: Try sambal bawang bu rudy, and you will fall in love with the taste :)

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Adhi Immanuel
text: Delicious taste and sometimes you have to queue... pay it forward for something good

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Admiral Admiral
text: If you like spicy foods, this place is good choice with "sambal bawang"😀😍

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Amanda Arifin
text: The best Sambal in town!

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Sugiharto Sugiharto
text:
New place..
Very comfy to shop and many variety for you to gift and eat..
Awesome..

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Ririn Wuriani
text: Clean, yummy, delicious.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Eryunpas Setya
text: Delicious food, friendly staff, affordable price

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: PAULUS H SILABAN
text: Nice shop with many varians Jawa Timur Foods for souvenir

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: malvin piero
text: Nice restaurant with nice service and high quality food

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Josephine Poedjianto
text: Super delicious food. Spacious place.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Zaenuddin
text: a convenient place to shop for souvenirs and eat with family

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Darren Suharko (darren15)
text: Nice

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: De
text:
HALAL FOOD

Makanan : 3/5
Minuman : 3/5
Harga : 3/5
Tempat : 4/5
Pelayanan : 4/5

Sebagai salah satu makanan legend dan kebanggaan khas Surabaya. Sekarang tempatnya besar dengan kelengkapan yang lebih lengkap. Mulai dari tempat makan hingga jualan oleh-oleh.

Nasi campur yang menjadi andalan, masih memiliki rasa yang sama dengan komposisi yang sama pula. Tidak hanya itu ada juga tahu pong hingga pisang goreng madu khas Bu Rudy yang boleh dicoba kalau kalian makan disini. Makin banyak pilihan lainnya juga.

Fasilitasnya juga semakin lengkap, ada lift, VIP room, hall kalau mau buat acara. Pelayanannya juga sangat ramah dan baik. Kalau kalian mau bawa teman-teman atau keluarga, tempat ini sangat cocok.

Sekian 🤘🏽🤘🏽🤘🏽🤘🏽

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: MAS' ONES
text:
Waiteres pramusaji dan casier kenapa pada berisik yah, kursi jg ngegeser bikin suara gaduh dan ngilu dengernya, makanan dan minuman nya enak2, tidak diragukan lagi, tapi sambal burudinya knp cuma pedas diawal yah, malah pedesan sambal bebek goreng 😁

Tapi pengalaman makan disini cukup
puas dan langsung bisa bungkus oleh1 khas 👍🏻

Makanan : 3/5
Minuman : 3/5
Tempat : 4,5/5
Kebersihan : 4/5

Semoga ada perbaikan kedepannya.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Angga Prasetya
text:
Saya membawa tamu untuk makan siang disini , kebetulan One Stop untuk keperluan belanja oleh-oleh dan makan siang

Kebetulan pesen
Makanan
- pecel daging empal 2
- nasi madura 1
Minuman
- es jeruk jumbo 1
- es teler 2

Overal harga aga masih masuk akal untuk kelas depot Surabaya

Saran sih
Nasi ditambah dan harusnya dibedakan untuk laki dan perempuan, kadang untuk perempuan kebanyakan untuk laki2 kurang banyak sedikit

Omong- omong
- parkir R4 lokasinya beda 1 halaman sama depot biayanya 5rb tanpa karcis.
- untuk driver sementara belum dapat tips dari kasir 🤣

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: ryryrizki
text:
Tempat yang sudah sangat terkenal, di lantai bawah bisa belanja oleh2 dan di lantai atas bisa makan.

Menu banyak dan bervariasi, saya coba nasi udang empal spesial, tapi udang crispy nya bubuk, empal nya juga bubuk, ntah karena udah malem jadi dapet “sisa” nya.
Segi rasa enak, tapi sayurnya rada keasinan.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Ika Kurnia
text: Ikon kuliner surabaya masakan rumahan/jawa timuran. Tempatnya paling besar dan luas diantara cabang lain, ada pusat oleh², tenant² makanan lain, jajanan pasar. Tempat duduknya banyak bgt ada outdoor, indoor dan ada mushola. Tempat makan di lantai 2.Kalau dri pintu masuk luar bisa naik tangga lalu lift. Makanannya tetep enak, sambel bandeng penyetnya seger. Dan tiap meja sedia sambal bawang. Dan tahu walik nya enak.  Pelayannya ramah dan cepat. Dan bisa ketemu bu rudy nya juga. Kalau bisa disediakan 1 space parkir motor dong bu di bassement enak adem. Jangan taruh diluar.

title: Depot Bu Rudy - Dharmahusada
name: Dini F. Pratiwi
text:
Datang pada hari Minggu, yang dirasakan pertama kali, susah dapat parkir. Naik langsung ke lantai 2 area makan dan memesan makanan, minuman dan camilan yang di rekomendasi.

Makanannya enak, minumnya pun juga enak. Hanya saja, disayangkan pada salah satu pramusaji yang ada di sana tidak ada kesopanan. Kenapa? Karna langsung mengambil buku menu yang saya taruh di kursi samping saya. Seharusnya bertanya, "apakah buku menunya sudah selesai/masih belum?"
